dcterms:creator: Eitan Altman
dcterms:description: A standard class of constraint critical environment models utilized in various applications such as autonomous robots, personalized medicine, online advertising, and financial management.
dcterms:title: Constrained Markov Decision Processes (CMDPs)

dcterms:creator: Eitan Altman
Adam Shwartz
dcterms:description: A framework for analyzing Nash equilibria in constrained Markov games, where agents compete under constraints.
dcterms:title: Constrained Markov Games (MGs)

Konstantin Avrachenkov
Richard Marquez
Gregory Miller
dcterms:description: A study of zero-sum constrained stochastic games with independent state processes, focusing on the dynamics of such games.
dcterms:title: Zero-sum Constrained Stochastic Games

Konstantin Avrachenkov
Nicolas Bonneau
Merouane Debbah

dcterms:description: An exploration of constrained cost-coupled stochastic games with independent state processes, focusing on the implications of such constraints.
dcterms:title: Constrained Cost-Coupled Stochastic Games

dcterms:creator: Shie Mannor
John N Tsitsiklis
Jia Yuan Yu
dcterms:description: A framework for online learning that incorporates sample path constraints, extending the capabilities of traditional reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Constrained Markov Decision Processes (CMDPs) with Side Constraints

dcterms:creator: Lucian Busoniu
Robert Babuska
Bart De Schutter
dcterms:description: A comprehensive survey covering various aspects of multi-agent reinforcement learning, including algorithms and applications.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning

dcterms:creator: Thomas M Cover
dcterms:description: A foundational text on information theory, covering essential concepts and applications.
dcterms:title: Safe Reinforcement Learning

Sai Koti Reddy Danda

dcterms:description: An exploration of actor-critic algorithms tailored for constrained multi-agent reinforcement learning scenarios.

Shaocong Ma

dcterms:description: A study focused on finding correlated equilibria in constrained Markov games using a primal-dual approach.

dcterms:description: A framework for learning in Markov decision processes while adhering to constraints, focusing on the balance between exploration and exploitation.
